line.token: * The Order Confirmation page shows order history.
* It also serves as the end point for the current order...
* once submitted, the Order Confirmation page shows the
"copy order items into a new order"

'

Your order will not be processed until your payment has been completed.

'

'

Please complete your payment before the order can be processed.

'
"A page where the customer can view her or his submitted order. Every e-commerce site needs an Order Confirmation Page."
* Standard SS function, we only allow for one OrderConfirmation Page to exist
* but we do allow for extensions to exist at the same time.
'Label for starting new order - e.g. click here to start new order.'
'Label for copying order items into a new one - e.g. click here start a new order with the current order items.'
"Header showing when order has been cancelled."
"Header showing when order has been paid in full."
"Header showing when the order has not been paid in full."
"Header showing when the order has not been paid in full - but the payment is pending."
"Message showing when order has been paid cancelled."
"Message showing when order has been paid in full."
"Message showing when the order has not been paid in full."
"Message showing when the order has not been paid in full - but the payment is pending."
"Enable E-commerce Google Analytics. Make sure it is turned on in your Google Analytics account."
